title: Commission Regulation ( EEC ) No 276/92 of 5 February 1992 amending Regulation ( EEC ) No 598/86 concerning the target ceiling for the 1991/92 marketing year for imports into Spain of common wheat of bread­making quality
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 276/92  of 5 February 1992  amending Regulation (EEC) No 598/86 concerning the target ceiling for the 1991/92 marketing year for imports into Spain of common wheat of bread-making quality
THE COMMISSION OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 4 of Regulation (EEC) No 598/86, '750 000' is replaced by '1 050 000'.
Article 1 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 96/92 is hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 February 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 55, 1. 3. 1986, p. 106. (2) OJ No L 293, 27. 10. 1988, p. 7. (3) OJ No L 58, 1. 3. 1986, p. 16. (4) OJ No L 5, 10. 1. 1992, p. 11. (5) OJ No L 57, 1. 3. 1986, p. 1. (6) OJ No L 11, 17. 1. 1992, p. 17.
